title: Drop out of promos right after my first lost
body: Me and my friend were duo in my promos to silver 3. It's my first promo match out of 3 and we lost it. Then there was a notification saying i haven't complete my series and got kick out. I thought i suppose to have another chance because it is bo3?

replies.body: Did you dodge any match during your promo series? If so, it would have counted as a loss and would have ended your promo series.
No, i remember that the match i lost was my very first match.
